buttons.tp2: Deal was closed by TP (Take Profit)
buttons.sl2: Deal was closed by SL (Stop Loss)

commands.dc_desc: Create a deal with given parameters
commands.pn_desc: Upper pair name of desired crypto
commands.ep_desc: An entry price (or place) where deal should start (can be number or text)
commands.tp_desc: Take profit value (can be number or text)
commands.sl_desc: Stop loss value (can be number or text)

buttons.sl2: L'operazione è stata chiusa per SL (Stop Loss)

buttons.sl2: La operación se cerró por SL (Stop Loss)

buttons.tp2: L'opération a été fermée par TP (Take Profit)
buttons.sl2: L'opération a été fermée par SL (Stop Loss)
buttons.er2: L'opération a été fermée plus tôt

buttons.tp2: Geschäft wurde durch TP (Take Profit) geschlossen
buttons.sl2: Geschäft wurde durch SL (Stop Loss) geschlossen

buttons.tp2: Сделка была закрыта по ТП (Тейк Профит)
buttons.sl2: Сделка была закрыта по СЛ (Стоп Лосс)
